text:
[Verse]
Stars up in the sky
Shining way up high
Whispering our dreams
In silvery beams

[Verse 2]
Night is quiet now
Moon is on the prowl
Hold my hand we’ll soar
Through the galaxy’s door

[Chorus]
Starlight dreams tonight
All the colors bright
We are dancing free
In the cosmic sea

[Verse 3]
Glowing from above
Cradled by the love
Lost in space and time
Hear the heavens chime

[Bridge]
Gravity can’t hold
All our stories told
We are weightless here
Love in stratosphere

[Chorus]
Starlight dreams tonight
All the colors bright
We are dancing free
In the cosmic sea
title: Starlight Dreams
